name: Slime Age: Parody MMORPG Clicker
description: The slime era has arrived!Slimes have captured all locations and hold valuable loot for adventurers!Which slime catches your fancy? Classic pink, slime-dog, or cat slime? Or perhaps slime-panda?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core2Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT220 Storage: 250 MB available space
